title: Skilled-Recognised Graduate visa (subclass 476)
summary: This page provides information for existing holders of the Skilled‑Recognised Graduate visa (subclass 476). The visa has been permanently closed to new applications, but current visa holders can review their rights, obligations, and important conditions. It also explains validity, travel rights, and requirements for reporting changes in circumstances.

visa_details.applicability: Information applies only to people who have already been granted this visa.

actions_permitted: travel in and out of Australia any number of times while the visa is valid

during_stay_requirements: maintain adequate health insurance while in Australia
continue to meet the requirements under which the visa was granted
leave Australia when the visa ends unless granted another visa

tools_and_resources.vevo_usage: Visa holders can use Visa Entitlement Verification Online (VEVO) for free to check visa details and entitlements.
